string_replace: You can use this function to parse a string looking for a specific part, which can then be replaced by the new string that you have specified.
The substring within the string to be replaced.
The new substring to replace the previous one.
This will set <tt>str2</tt> to <tt>str1</tt>, but with its instance of "Earth" replaced with "World", resulting in <tt>str2</tt> being "Hello World".
